com.linecorp.armeria.client

Interface ClientCodec

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DecoratingClientCodec, SimpleHttpClientCodec, ThriftClientCodec

    public interface ClientCodec
    Encodes an invocation into a ByteBuf and decodes its result (ByteBuf) into a Java object.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  ClientCodec.EncodeResult
      The result of ClientCodec.encodeRequest().

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> T decodeResponse(ServiceInvocationContext ctx, ByteBuf content, Object originalResponse)
      Decodes the response bytes into a Java object.
      ClientCodec.EncodeResult encodeRequest(Channel channel, SessionProtocol sessionProtocol, Method method, Object[] args)
      Encodes a Java method invocation into a ServiceInvocationContext.
      boolean isAsyncClient()
      Returns true if the invocation result that will be returned to calling code asynchronously.
      <T> void prepareRequest(Method method, Object[] args, Promise<T> resultPromise)
      Invoked when a RemoteInvoker prepares to perform an invocation.
